sheet_title: (N) ADU Floor Plan w/ Schedules & Elect.
description: New ADU floor plan with electrical layout, window schedule, door schedule, electrical symbols legend, fire-rated wall detail, egress standards, smoke/CO alarm notes, kitchen electrical notes, and plumbing fixture notes. Extremely dense sheet combining floor plan, schedules, and code compliance notes.
key_content: Window schedule: 4+ windows, vinyl frames, tempered glass, slider type (contractor to verify all openings)
Door schedule: 5 doors, wood material, includes security locks, privacy locks, French door
1 HR. Fire Rated Exterior Wall assembly detail (per detail #1-1.3)
Minimum bedroom egress: 5.7 sq ft net clear opening, 24" min height, 20" min width, 44" max sill height
Smoke & carbon monoxide alarms: hardwired with battery backup, interconnected, per R314 and R315
Plumbing fixture notes: kitchen faucet 1.8 GPM, lavatory 1.2 GPM, showerhead 1.8 GPM, toilet 1.28 GPF (HET)
Kitchen electrical: all outlets GFCI protected, outlets within 48" of counter locations
Exhaust fan: Energy Star rated, ceiling mounted
Electrical sub-panel location shown on plan
Clothes dryer exhaust ducting terminated to exterior
NOT SHOWN: window U-factor and SHGC values in window schedule
NOT SHOWN: specific room dimensions (obscured by watermark)
NOT SHOWN: ADU interior livable area (sq ft) on this sheet
NOT SHOWN: range hood CFM specification
NOT SHOWN: electrical panel amperage/location detail

1 HR. Fire Rated Exterior Wall section detail (16" OC, insulation, 2x stud)

Means of Egress, Wall Covering, Clothes Dryer Exhaust Ducting, Plumbing Fixture Notes
